EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Full Agenda 8-28-18 - Spring NORTHAM
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform Full Agenda Available + Win A Lunch With Our Spring Technologists
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Complete 2018 Agenda is Now Available This year’s SpringOne Platform 2018 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]> is taking place in Washington, D.C., from September 24–27, and includes 150+ sessions, more than 20 main stage speakers, onsite training, and networking opportunities across several events. Check out our recently finalized conference agenda <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/agenda?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]> and sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]> to see everything in store at this year’s event. Your conference pass also gives you access to a number of conference extras, including our third annual Apache Geode™ Summit <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/geode?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]>, agile meetings at Open Space <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/open-space?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]>, a whole-lot-of-fun Lightning Talks <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/lightning-talks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]>, and several hands-on workshops <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/agenda#monday]]>. Hear from Main Stage speakers: <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/ted-colbert]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/jenny-zhang]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/oliver-gierke]]>
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/lauren-knausenberger]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/juergen-hoeller]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/speakers/olga-kundzich]]>
And many more!
Register to Win a Lunch with Josh Long, Mark Heckler and James Weaver
Looking for one more reason to join us at SpringOne Platform? Register between August 28 and September 14 and you will be entered for a chance to have lunch with Spring experts Josh Long, Mark Heckler, and James Weaver!
Register with code: Attendees_Lunch <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]> for $200 off your ticket AND your shot at lunch with the Spring Developer Advocates!
The winner will be announced on September 17!
Discounted hotel rooms at the Gaylord National Resort, our conference hotel, are limited and going quickly. Register <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-full-agenda-2018]]> before August 30th so you don't miss out!
We hope to see you there, The SpringOne Platform Team
